# Image View package

Open images in an editor in Atom. Support zooming via `cmd-+`, `cmd--`, and
`cmd-0`.


Currently supports the following file extensions:

  * `.gif`
  * `.ico`
  * `.jpeg`
  * `.jpg`
  * `.png`

![](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/671378/2241669/7df82fec-9cdc-11e3-992d-f19a7235ebda.png)
